prompts.text: Given this dataset, generate the most appropriate 2D Vega-Lite JSON spec for my data. Return only valid JSON.
Create a 2D visualization that best communicates the main pattern in this data. Choose mark and encodings automatically. Return only Vega-Lite JSON.
Create a 2D relationship chart between two relevant fields in this data. Use proper axis types and readable defaults.
Produce a 2D comparison chart across categories with clear x/y encodings, sorting, and labels where appropriate.
Generate a 2D ranking visualization from this dataset, selecting the most meaningful metric and category fields automatically.
